Ranks and skins. that's it. Buy access to competitive and grind for 14 hours a day to try to get a higher rank to progress up to Global Elite like everyone else playing ranked. Also, don't forget to spend all of your money on cases and keys so that you can gamble virtually without it giving you money but just a f'ing cool looking gun. If you run out of money (and also other people's too) you should get a loan from the bank and repeat the process over and over until you get a knife. If you don't get a knife and no-ones giving you money anymore, take out mortgages on the house you live in or sell your car, maybe both!
Or just do none of that and play unranked competitive with no skins. (loser)

Sehr zu empfehlen. Man kann hier nicht nur Polen in den Kopf schießen, sondern auch wunderbar russisch lernen. Zudem braucht man, wenn man schon nebenbei russisch lernt, nur auf einen Spot laufen, welcher B ist. Natürlich ist die einzige Map, welche man spielt Dust 2, welche sollte man denn sonst spielen? ;)
